tns:Request.tns:content: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:urn="urn:http.service.asset.portlet.liferay.com" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <urn:addCategory soapenv:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <parentCategoryId xsi:type="xsd:long">{$parentCategoryId}</parentCategoryId> <titleMapLanguageIds xsi:type="urn:ArrayOf_xsd_string" soapenc:arrayType="soapenc:string[]"> <string>en_US</string> </titleMapLanguageIds> <titleMapValues xsi:type="urn:ArrayOf_xsd_string" soapenc:arrayType="soapenc:string[]"> <string>{$title}</string> </titleMapValues> <descriptionMapLanguageIds xsi:type="urn:ArrayOf_xsd_string" soapenc:arrayType="soapenc:string[]"> <string>en_US</string> </descriptionMapLanguageIds> <descriptionMapValues xsi:type="urn:ArrayOf_xsd_string" soapenc:arrayType="soapenc:string[]"> <string>{$description}</string> </descriptionMapValues> <vocabularyId xsi:type="xsd:long">{$vocabularyId}</vocabularyId> <categoryProperties xsi:type="urn:ArrayOf_xsd_string" soapenc:arrayType="soapenc:string[]"/> <serviceContext xsi:type="ser:ServiceContext" xmlns:ser="http://service.portal.liferay.com"> </serviceContext> </urn:addCategory> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
